content.prompt:
All eukaryotic cells contain at least one Golgi complex, typically located in the cytoplasm and near the endoplasmic reticulum.

Which of the following best describes a process that occurs within the Golgi complex?

choices.label: Enzymatic modification of newly synthesized integral membrane proteins
Synthesis of cytosolic proteins based on the nucleotide sequences of mRNAs
Degradation of proteins by hydrolytic enzymes contained within the complex
Synthesis of various types of lipids
